description: Pair ripped stud Ivan Andros with super-hung Michael Brandon. You have not seen Michael Brandon in a major new movie for almost a full year, so he had a lot of pent up frustration to get out. Who better to take this sexual abuse than Ivan, Raging Stallion's new stunning exclusive? And you thought Ivan was just a top? Well, think again and get out your cum towel. If you have not shot your load yet in this movie, this one will drain you dry within the first few minutes. Chris Ward, who directed this movie together with Michael Brandon, feels strongly that this is one of the top five scenes of his entire directing career. It is amazingly hot and is a must watch for all Michael Brandon fans.
title: Party In The Rear
